channel.title: [non-Steam] Lambda Core: after obtaining Jumper Module, door closes and locks player out.
channel.description:
Hello team,
after obtaining the Jumper Module in the chapter Lambda Core I tried it out a little, and went through the corridor, hurtling through the open door. I quickly backed up, and noticed it was closing, then I could not get in any more. This is me stuck in front of the door, can't go back either ([url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=590853220[/url]).
[code]> status map : bm_c3a2h at: 1125 x, -111 y, 64 z > getpos setpos 1125.654541 -111.968750 64.031250;setang -4.554104 94.831223 0.000000[/code]
